name: Roll-a-Ball (GameConDev)
description:
Note: This was made with Godot 3.4.2

I made this for a school project; I don't know what grade I'm getting for it yet, but I hope to get an A on it.

Wish me good luck, my friends! 😁😁😁

Another note: If you find any bugs, please LET ME KNOW! I am more than happy to fix them! 😀😀😀
